scripts.deploy:pkg: scp package.json ru:/home/mabel/.3f-lab/_humanitarian/black-book && ssh ru npm i --omit=dev --prefix=/home/mabel/.3f-lab/_humanitarian/black-book --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.deploy:restart: ssh ru sudo service black-book restart
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:rsync && npm run deploy:restart
scripts.backup: ssh ru sudo service redis-backup start && rsync -ar ru:/home/mabel/.3f-lab/_humanitarian/black-book/backup/*.* backup
